60fcac38-8bb1-4589-8dff-cf65a3098d63.name: node
60fcac38-8bb1-4589-8dff-cf65a3098d63.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'node')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'kube_node_info')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'node') != '')

770101b2-b802-40ce-a3e9-bdf497afed24.name: namespace
770101b2-b802-40ce-a3e9-bdf497afed24.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'namespace')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'kube_namespace_created')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'namespace') != '')

filter.expression: condition = 'DiskPressure' AND node in ['{{.node}}'] AND status = 'true'
condition = 'MemoryPressure' AND node in ['{{.node}}'] AND status = 'true'
condition = 'PIDPressure' AND node in ['{{.node}}'] AND status = 'true'
